user.title: Electrolux Home Configuration
user.description:
Configure your Electrolux Home integration.

**How to get your credentials:**
1. Go to [Electrolux Developer Portal]({docs_url})
2. Create an account and register your application
3. Get your API Key from the dashboard
4. Generate Access Token and Refresh Token

**Scan Interval:** How often to check for device updates (in seconds). Default: 120 seconds.

init.title: Electrolux Home Options
init.description:
Configure how often the integration should check for device updates.

**Scan Interval:** Time in seconds between device state updates. Lower values mean more frequent updates but higher API usage.
